properties.Name: 1974 Shattuck
properties.Required Demolition: Five commercial buildings; merge four lots. Includes McDonald's and Spats.
properties.Notes: Tallest proposed building in Berkeley so far. Also labeled as 1950-98 Shattuck Avenue.

properties.Name: The Hub
properties.Required Demolition: Two buildings (one mixed-use with 16 rent-controlled units, one commercial). Multiple formerly closed restaurants.

properties.Name: 2190 Shattuck
properties.Notes: Controversial design as it would block Golden Gate Bridge view from the Campanile.

properties.Name: 2029 University
properties.Required Demolition: Existing non-landmarked 2-story commercial structure and surface parking.

properties.Name: 2274 Shattuck
properties.Required Demolition: The commercial building with the preservation and renovation the front façade and lobby. Former UA Theater.

properties.Name: 1899 Oxford
properties.Required Demolition: An existing non-landmarked structure and surface parking.

properties.Name: 2113 Kittredge
properties.Required Demolition:
The commercial building on a
landmarked site (preserving the front façade. Former California Theater.
properties.Notes: Would include a new 300-seat live theater space.

properties.Name: 2015 Blake
properties.Required Demolition: One residential building, an associated accessory structure, and two nonresidential buildings.
properties.Notes: No building permits listed in city database.

properties.Name: The Logan
properties.Notes: Spread across two adjacent 8-story buildings; 204 units total.

properties.Name: 2100 Milvia
properties.Required Demolition: Existing two story office building.

properties.Name: 2065 Kittredge
properties.Required Demolition: Portions of existing City Landmark commercial buildings.

properties.Name: 2176 Kittredge
properties.Required Demolition: One-story convenience store and carwash facility.

properties.Name: Ace Berkeley
properties.Required Demolition: Berkeley Vacuum & Sewing Center.

properties.Name: 2012 Berkeley Way
properties.Required Demolition: Existing City parking lot with 112 spaces.
properties.Notes: 142 affordable housing units, transitional dorms (6 rooms, 12 beds), temporary housing (32 beds), and support services. Joint project between BRIDGE Housing and the Berkeley Food and Housing Project.

properties.Name: 2420 Shattuck
properties.Required Demolition: Two existing two-story commercial buildings, merge two lots.

properties.Name: 2109 Milvia
properties.Required Demolition: Existing parking lot.

properties.Name: 2036 Bancroft
properties.Required Demolition: Two existing landmarked buildings and a partial landmarked commercial office building.

properties.Name: 2276 Shattuck
properties.Required Demolition: Retaining of the existing east and south facades of the existing morse block building; Reduction of existing 32,350 square feet of commercial space to 7,486 square feet.

properties.Name: Aquatic at U
properties.Required Demolition: One existing commercial and one mixed-use structure containing two dwelling units.
properties.Notes: Also known as 2000 University. Building permit expired 2023.

properties.Name: 2037 Durant
properties.Required Demolition: A one-story, 13,000 square-foot commercial building.

properties.Name: 2550 Shattuck
properties.Required Demolition: A 2-story (25 feet) 14,296 square-foot non-residential building.
properties.Notes: Technically zoned as "Adeline Corridor Commercial District (C-AC)".

properties.Name: 2099 Martin Luther King
properties.Required Demolition: Goodyear Tires.

properties.Name: 2138 Kittredge
properties.Required Demolition: Existing 3-unit residential building.

properties.Name: 2127 Dwight
properties.Required Demolition: Two of the existing four residential buildings (demolish eight units and retain eight units).
properties.Notes: Technically zoned as "South Area Commercial District".

properties.Name: 2440 Shattuck
properties.Required Demolition: One existing commercial building.

properties.Name: 2018 Blake
properties.Required Demolition: A single-family dwelling.
